title: Got a Low Priority Queue
body: My game crashed when I was banning and now im forced to go through a dodge {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: I'm happy to help resolve whatever is causing you to crash and prevent further queue dodge penalties!  As a first step, if you're using any third party programs like play.tv I recommend removing them.  They've been known to cause issues like this.  If you still have any issues, let me know with some more details of what you're seeing!
